mapper.select: SELECT 전담자번호 memberLoginPK, 지점 memberBranch, 이름 memberUserName, 권한 memberRole, 아이디 memberUserID, 비밀번호 memberUserPW, 관리자권한 memberISManager, 등록일 memberRegDate, 고유번호 memberUniqueNumber FROM J_참여자관리_로그인정보 WHERE 아이디=#{memberUserID} AND 비밀번호=#{memberUserPW} AND (아이디사용여부 NOT IN ('퇴사','정지','잠금') OR 아이디사용여부 IS NULL)
SELECT 전담자번호 memberLoginPK, 지점 memberBranch, 이름 memberUserName, 권한 memberRole, 아이디 memberUserID FROM J_참여자관리_로그인정보 WHERE 지점=#{memberBranch}

SELECT A.이름 memberUserName, A.아이디 memberUserID, B.유형1 memberType1, B.유형2 memberType2, A.금일일반취업 memberTodayEmployment, A.금일알선취업 memberTodayPlacement, A.금주일반취업 memberToWeekEmployment, A.금주알선취업 memberToWeekPlacement, A.금월일반취업 memberToMonthEmployment, A.금월알선취업 memberToMonthPlacement, A.금년일반취업 memberToYearEmployment, A.금년알선취업 memberToYearPlacement, A.실적저장일 endUpdateStatus FROM J_참여자관리_로그인정보 A JOIN J_참여자관리_지점 B ON A.지점 = B.지점 WHERE A.지점=#{memberBranch} ORDER BY endUpdateStatus DESC
